alert.note: Alert for Fillmore; Olmsted; Wabasha (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 22 at 5:06PM CDT by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Winona, eastern Olmsted, Wabasha, north central Fillmore and central Buffalo Counties through 600 PM CDT... At 505 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Stockholm to 9 miles southwest of Pepin to near Goodhue. Movement was southeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Wabasha around 525 PM CDT. Plainview and Kellogg around 535 PM CDT. Alma around 540 PM CDT. Buffalo City around 545 PM CDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
